text: I, the Worst of All () is a 1990 Argentine Mexican biographical movie directed by María Luisa Bemberg and was based on the novel Sor Juana: Or, the Traps of Faith by Octavio Paz. It stars Assumpta Serna, Dominique Sanda, Héctor Alteio, Lautaro Murúa, Graciela Araujo, Rosario Bléfari. ==Other websites== * Category:1990 movies Category:1990s biographical movies Category:Argentine biographical movies Category:Mexican biographical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by María Luisa Bemberg
title: I, the Worst of All
